name: Where Is My Bunny?
description:
Description

A small child has lost their best friend: their toy bunny. You must help them look for the bunny by guiding them through the deep dark dungeon in their wardrobe, using your senses as your guide. Relying on sound to find your way, look out for puzzle pieces - these are the key to unlocking the door. Have you found the bunny yet? Keep your eyes peeled though; the puzzle pieces aren't the only things hiding in the shadows...

Installation

You can either play in your browser or offline.

To play offline, click the download link below. Once download has completed, unzip the file and open the WhereIsMyBunny application. You're all good to go!
